text: @piersmorgan At this point, just like the civil rights movement, people are willing to die for the cause. We are fighting two wars, Covid19 & Racial Injustice, Racial Bias, Systematic Racism. We are fighting individuals like you who try to supress our pain & say we are race baiting. No more!
